mapper.select: select ece.title, ece.cover, ece.lesson_num as lessonNum, convert(ece.price ,decimal(10,2)) as price, su1.title as subjectLevelOne, su2.title as subjectLevelTwo, etr.`name` as teacherName from edu_course ece left join edu_teacher etr on ece.teacher_id = etr.id left join edu_subject su1 on ece.subject_parent_id = su1.id left join edu_subject su2 on ece.subject_id = su2.id where ece.id = #{id}

select ece.id, ece.title, convert(ece.price ,decimal(10,2)) as price, ece.lesson_num as lessonNum, ece.cover, ece.buy_count as buyCount, ece.view_count as viewCount, ecd.description, etr.id as teacherId, etr.name as teacherName, etr.intro, etr.avatar, su1.id as subjectLevelOneId, su1.title as subjectLevelOne, su2.id as subjectLevelTwoId, su2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course ece left join edu_teacher etr on ece.teacher_id = etr.id left join edu_course_description ecd on ece.id = ecd.id left join edu_subject su1 on ece.subject_parent_id = su1.id left join edu_subject su2 on ece.subject_id = su2.id where ece.id = #{courseId}
